infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to connect to devices.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Bluetooth access is required to scan and connect to devices.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to show your position on the map and verify you're within the service area.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app needs location access to track your rides and enforce geofence boundaries.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take a photo of the bike when ending a ride.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to save bike photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: This app needs location access to show your position on the map and verify you're within the service area.

plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to save bike images.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app needs camera access to take photos of bikes when ending rides.
